shiori_description.description: In Side Stories, you can unlock special stories to enjoy.\nEach story will become available as you clear the corresponding quests.
This event features an exclusive character to unlock\nby clearing a specific mission.\nPlease do your best to achieve the mission requirements.

When clearing this event's quests and bosses, special Intimacy Episodes\nmay appear. You will earn Intimacy with the characters based on your\nresponses, and they may give you gifts at certain milestones.
